archimate:Capability.name: Enterprise search
archimate:Capability.documentation:
Enterprise Search is a digital capability to enable users to locate the content or information they want quickly and accurately, through keyword search into a variety of sources, such as file system, intranet, content repository, email, database, data warehouse and/or data lake.
Before the contemporary digital area, the Enterprise Search capability was focused on searching through structured data stored in relational databases. Now the challenge is to search a massive amount of data with little-to-no structure; mostly textual information without any pre-defined format or layout.
